name: franny granny square sweater
sizes_available: xs (s, m, l, xl) (2xl, 3xl, 4xl, 5xl) - 30" to 62" chest
notes:
create your own stylish statement piece with this modern granny square sweater pattern! perfect for all skill levels, this pdf crochet pattern features a detailed granny square yoke paired with a trendy granny stitch body. perfect for using up your yarn stash and being creative with colour.

*please note*-- this listing is for a pdf pattern written in english, not a finished product.

**pattern features:**
adult sizes xs to 5xl (30-62" chest): ensure the perfect fit for every body type.
skill level: intermediate
stitch: granny stitch 
instant pdf download
adjustable length, sleeves, and styling options
full video tutorial (to support written pattern if you are a visual learner)
us crochet terms
uk stitch conversion chart

**why you'll love this pattern:**
versatile design: customize with optional sleeves and choose between cuff styles.
adjustable length: easily modify the length of the body to suit your preference.
detailed instructions: 25-page pdf in us crochet terms for clear, easy-to-follow guidance.

**materials needed:**
category 3 or 4 (dk/light worsted) yarn (i used hayfield bonus dk, 100% acrylic, with 306yds/100g)
crochet hook 4.5mm (g+) or the size that meets the gauge for the pattern.
yarn needle
scissors
2 stitch markers

**pattern includes:**
detailed instructions over 25 page ebook
stitch guide
sizing chart/schematic
yoke stitch diagrams
colour inspiration page
full video tutorial
customisation guide

**instant download:** 
start crocheting your own unique sweater today! purchase includes immediate access to the 25-page pdf pattern in us crochet terms.

**gauge:** 
16sts and 8 rows = 4" by 4" over a dc granny stitch.
bring a modern twist to the classic granny square with this versatile jumper pattern. whether you're crafting for yourself or a loved one, this design offers endless possibilities for personalization and creativity.

**need help?**
we're here for you! contact us anytime for pattern support or questions.

note:
this listing is for a digital download pdf pattern, not the finished sweater. due to the nature of digital downloads, no refunds will be issued.

enjoy the timeless retro charm of granny squares with a contemporary flair. download your pattern now and crochet your way to a one-of-a-kind wardrobe staple that everyone will love!
